turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order cofee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what Starbucks store you are having in mind.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 550 West Plum Lane

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, how many orders do you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one, just me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think about Caramel Brulee Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What grande do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What milk would you prefer.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think about whole milk. Well, I am sorry, let it be 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you want whipped cream with it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One Blueberry Muffin would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your order is on Blueberry Muffin, Caramel Brulee Latte tall, with 2% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time is comfortable for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 9:30 am, I think.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is anything else you want to add.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Buy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good buy.
